SEARCH:
程序包 ltseed.chatinmc.Talker.ChatGPT

类 ChatGPTChatUsingProxy

java.lang.Object
ltseed.chatinmc.Talker.ChatGPT.ChatGPTChatUsingProxy
所有已实现的接口:
Talkative
public class ChatGPTChatUsingProxy extends Object implements Talkative
A Talkative implementation that uses the OpenAI GPT-3 API to generate text responses for a given input. This implementation uses a proxy server to send requests to the OpenAI API. The chat() method takes in a String representing the user's input and returns a String representing the generated response. The setKey() method allows for the API key used to authenticate requests to be updated. This class requires the Config.chatGPT_key field to be set with a valid API key before it can be used. Example usage: ChatGPTChatUsingProxy chatbot = new ChatGPTChatUsingProxy("session_id"); String response = chatbot.chat("Hello!");
版本:
1.0
作者:
ltseed

    • chat

      public String chat(String string)
      聊天方法，使用给定的输入字符串与ChatGPT API进行交互，并返回生成的文本。
      指定者:
      chat 在接口中 Talkative
      参数:
      string - 输入的字符串
      返回:
      生成的文本
      抛出:
      NullPointerException - 如果输入字符串为null
      RuntimeException - 如果请求失败或生成的文本为null
